score.title: Southeast Alaska
paragraphs: Adding some pitch black and blood red to the great white north ... fishing villages and fishing village idiots, timber contracts and factory ships, State Troopers in floatplanes and the weird guys who hide when they fly over - set among the emerald forests of southeast Alaska's vast archipelago, this playset drags an offbeat but familiar setting into the crosshairs.

relationships.title: Friendship
elements: Old friends from back in Juneau

relationships.title: Crime
elements: Fishing outlaws (quota thieves, endangered species bycatch sellers)

relationships.title: Around the village
elements: Church folk (deacon, Sunday school teacher, secretary)
Alcoholics Anonymous / Narconon sponsor and participant
Representative / citizen (Case worker, parole officer, native corporation official)
Athletes (recreation league, coach, pick-up games, minor league)

relationships.title: Work
elements: Professional and client (doctor, lawyer, dealer, wilderness guide)

needs.title: To get even
elements: ... with a state or federal agency
... with this village, for what it has turned you into
... with this village, and all the nosy, small people in it

needs.title: To get the truth
elements: ... about the thing you saw in Kaku Inlet

needs.title: To get respect
elements: ... from this town, by bringing down the fishing monopoly
... from this town, by teaching them to be afraid
... from your lover, by proving your devotion
... from the police, by turning in your own kin to the state troopers
... from a family member, by doing what they never could
... from yourself, by solving the problem permanently

needs.title: To get laid
elements: ... by that special someone who doesn't even know you exist
... in the middle of the Russian Orthodox church
... by an old lover, to see if sparks fly again
... in a drunken stupor, by whoever you end up with
... by someone who can really grease the wheels for your project
... to prove you've still got it

needs.title: To get out
elements: ... of this town, because you have big dreams
... of this town, to escape family and tradition
... of an obligation to a dangerous outsider
... of an obligation to your family

needs.title: To get rich
elements: ... through the death of a native elder
... through ripping off the village emergency fund
... through stealing a pile of fishing boat IFQ money

locations.title: First street
elements: Southeast Federal Credit Union, the only bank in town

locations.title: Tongass avenue
elements: The Municipal building, police station, courthouse and city hall
Pacific Medical Clinic, the only doctor in town
Sun Chasers tanning salon and weight loss center

locations.title: The harbor
elements: Aboard the purse seiner MV Julie Autumn
Neptune Aviation Services and state floatplane dock
Holiday Lines cruise ship terminal and office

locations.title: Residences
elements: The trailer at the end of Tongass Avenue

locations.title: The backcountry
elements: The four-wheeler track out to Kaku inlet

locations.title: Kaku inlet
elements: University of Alaska Southeast fisheries research station
The Skinny Dick dam and reservoir

objects.title: Ugly
elements: Candid videotape of a former Governor

objects.title: Valuables
elements: Mason jar filled with pre-revolution Russian gold coins
Purebred Weimeraner with an ear tattoo

objects.title: Sentimental
elements: Old letters from a dead man
Family heirloom no longer in family possession
